description: thick artist book with possible tar paper cover with white text; first page wrapped in vinyl tarp, unwraps to fabric covered board; textured cardboard inner pages protect staggered paper pages with black and white printed drawings with German text; ties with black cords; lender's archive #188
medium: Charcoal, graphite, letterpress, and photocopied illustrations; bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018
title: Asche im Rhein 2
